Description:
Single Level, Low Maintenance.
Perfect for the first home buyer or investor, soak up the good life in this contemporary three-bedroom residence situated in the peaceful highlands estate. Single-level, low maintenance in a convenient location, this property presents the perfect start for any young homeowners.
Featuring;
Three bedrooms total, all with built in storage
Master bedroom with full ensuite, walk through robe and exterior roller shutters
Open living kitchen and dining area opening out to the outdoor courtyard
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry
Courtyard freshly concreted with Colorbond fencing surrounding
Main bathroom with separate bath and shower
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling with NBN internet connectivity
Single car remote lockup garage
Insights: 15 Bottlebrush Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic First Home, Downsizing or Investment Opportunity!
Located to perfection and affordable this street facing unit will be sure to impress first home buyers, downsizes and the astute investor. Conveniently located a short walk to Craigieburn train station, Primary and Secondary colleges, Hothlyn Drive Reserve and shopping strip and easy access to the Hume Highway and Bridgewater Road.
With a welcoming sun-drenched interior this humble abode offers 3 bedrooms with BIR's, 2-way bathroom and separate toilet, front lounge, kitchen/meals area that leads outside to a low maintenance courtyard and alfresco area that is perfect to entertain family and friends.
Added features include single car garage with internal access, new carpet, freshly painted, ducted heating, evap cooling and so much more
Contact: Domenic Campisi - 0412 777 372
https://www.facebook.com/domeniccampisirealestate/

Description:
38sq of Architectural Brilliance & Next-Level Luxury
Elevating the concept of luxury living to a whole new level, this truly amazing 4 bedroom family home delivers an unmatched environment of elegance & opulence with its bold architecture, intelligent design & best-of-the-best inclusions from start to finish.
Towering 3m ceilings throughout, the home's spectacular interior boasts an enormous master
bedroom with built-in makeup vanity & luxurious spa ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms,
second ensuite, main family bathroom (also with spa) & guest powder room (fourth WC).
Add to this a dedicated theatre room with tiered flooring, incredibly spacious & endlessly
versatile open-plan living & dining areas complemented by 2 gourmet kitchens - both with
their own sink, first-class appliances & ample cupboard space.
Other luxuries include zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & CCTV, custom
lighting, large laundry and excellent storage options, along with walk-in robes to all bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling tiles (bathrooms, powder room & laundry), data cabling, soft-close cabinetry & granite benchtops throughout.
Stacker doors from the living area lead out to a fabulous al-fresco entertaining area & private landscaped backyard with northerly aspect, plus the added advantage of an oversized double garage (remote-control) with internal entry.
Close to Aston's parks, sports facilities & endless walking/cycling trails, it also offers easy access to childcare and schools (Craigieburn South Secondary School due to open in 2020), Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, public transport & major arterials. Most impressive!
Insights: 30 Esteem Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Contact CRAIG FROST on 0413018033 for a PRIVATE INSPECTION
We invite you to contact us on 0413 018 033 with any enquiries and to arrange a private inspection of this property as no open homes are scheduled. In the meantime, we would like to let you know a little bit more about this property.
This beautifully presented three bedroom home offers a functional floorplan with a generous open plan living, kitchen and dining area, serving as the main hub of the home. The kitchen meets high expectations with breakfast bar, stone bench tops, stainless steel range hood and sink, large fridge space and deep walk in pantry with additional bench space and shelving.
The open plan living and dining area looks out onto the covered outdoor entertaining area with built in bbq, the ideal place to end a long day. The rear yard beyond offers low maintenance gardening with a small grassed area, bird avery, cubby house, garden shed and clothes line. The side of the home with concrete surface provides a desirable space to store outdoor items or small trailer.
The main bedroom located at the front of the house is complimented with a sliding robe and ensuite, complete with tiled shower, duel vanity basin, under bench cabinetry and toilet. The two additional bedrooms share the family bathroom, including bath, shower, vanity basin, under bench storage and separate toilet.
Additional extras include vertical blinds, dual blinds, tiled wet areas, freshly paint, single lock up garage and landscaped gardens. Located in a leafy street on approximately 294sqm, the new owner will appreciate being close to public transport (bus 529 533) (Craigieburn train station), fast food outlets, shopping precincts including Craigieburn central, primary and secondary schools, reserves, parklands and childcare.
Additional extras include solar panels, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, alarm system, security cameras linked to mobile phone app, vertical blinds, tiled wet areas and fresh paint.
A note to buyers
We base our price ranges on comparable sales within the area and current market conditions. We do not over quote property to vendors or underquote property to buyers. We recognise that the final sale price will ultimately be influenced by competition within the market and that the advertised selling range is not a ceiling to the price buyers may be willing to pay to secure the purchase of the property.
Frost Real Estate is pleased to be able to offer our buyers complete dedication to your discrete purchasing experience. Every interested buyer is invited to put their best offer forward for the property with the knowledge that offers will not be disclosed between buyers. At the heart of Frost Real Estate is a passion for helping people enjoy the experience of purchasing and selling property. We hope that this information helps you with your property search.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for your own satisfaction. Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for further information and to arrange a private inspection.
Insights: 30 Taylan Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
When Location Matters
Two of the first things that crosses your mind when you want build your dream home are location and lifestyle. Luckily for you Biggin & Scott North is proud to present 40 Peninsula Crescent, Craigieburn- a genuinely decent sized block of land located in the ever so popular Highlands Estate-that you can be glad to call yours!
This North East facing 578m2 allotment is located to offer you convenience and comfort, the block is within close proximity to all necessary amenities that Craigieburn's ever-growing and vibrant community has!
So wait no more, and give our agents a call today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Supersized sensation!
Positioned to perfection and deceptively spacious, this ultra-modern 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhouse offers family luxury with an affordable price tag.
Discover a supersized kitchen with stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher flowing through to roomy and radiant open-plan living and dining.
Impeccably sunlit and stylish, enjoy a versatile upstairs retreat, extensive heating and cooling, and an oversized yard purpose-built for entertaining.
3 large bedrooms, palatial main with stunning twin-vanity ensuite and WIR, 2 with BIR
Luxurious centrally located family bathroom with separate WC
Handy study nook
Ground-floor powder room
Separate laundry
Ducted heating and cooling on both levels
Remote-controlled double garage with internal access
Ample storage
Securely tenanted until June 2020
Convenience is king with Aitken Creek Primary School, Highlands General Store, the 529 bus, and the local childcare centre all just footsteps away.
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Live At The Centre of Everything
First time offered for sale, much loved cherished over the years & impeccably presented, this proud double fronted brick veneer beauty lends itself perfectly to all home buyers & investors alike.
Conveniently located within minutes to Craigieburn Plaza, Primary & Secondary Schools, bus stop & all important amenities, comprising of 4 large bedrooms all with great storage, 2 main bathrooms (1 recently renovated), well-appointed kitchen with an abundance of cupboard & bench space, modern appliances, adjoining meals area, dual living areas including a welcoming formal lounge, spacious sun-drenched rumpus & should you feel up for all-seasons entertaining outdoors, the home effortlessly links outside to a semi-enclosed pergola & wonderful back garden where large-scale family gatherings will be an absolute pleasure.
Jam-packed with extras such as 2x wall heaters, 2x split system cooling units, long driveway providing ample off-street parking, double undercover carport, single lock-up-garage & spread out on approx 646m2!
If space, land & location are high on your agenda, then this home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish-list!

Description:
Picture Perfect with Sanctuary Views
Sure to make an impression that lasts and almost brand new, this luxurious Porter Davis 'Hamptons' inspired family home is well situated the highly coveted Highlands 'Sanctuary Lakeside Precinct'.
Greeted by a spacious entry with formal lounge overlooking the lake, on offer are good sized bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, a well-appointed kitchen with stone bench top, 900mm SS appliances, dishwasher and walk-in pantry with timber French doors, adjoining to the open plan meals and family area along with separate room and spacious alfresco with large stacking door and beautiful landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double garage, separate central bathroom, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double glazed windows throughout, quality window furnishings including timber plantation shutters, chic light fittings including downlights & quality floor covering including floating timber floors.
Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throws away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!

Description:
Convenient & Affordable Townhouse!
Style, functional design and a delightful location provide the perfect backdrop for low maintenance living. A lifestyle choice or investment option, this opportunity is not to be missed.
*Two bedrooms and a central bathroom plus downstairs powder room. Both bedrooms include built in robes.
*Open plan informal living incorporating streamlined kitchen with tiled splashback, stainless steel appliances, stone benches and storage, adjoining dining and living room
*Seamless access from kitchen to the balcony extends the entertaining options.
*Features include split system air conditioner, single garage with remote control, contemporary interior décor including modern colour scheme, window coverings, quality flooring, high ceilings,LED down lights, and more!
Ideally situated approximately 1km to Highlands Shopping Centre. With Newbury Primary School, the 529 Bus Route and specialty shops at the end of Melville Road, you wont find better!

Description:
Outstanding Family Home
In a family-focused neighbourhood and located within easy reach of all amenities, this single-level home presents a ready-made lifestyle of size & versatility with its extended floorplan & wonderfully large block of land.
For buyers that appreciate space, light & functionality the home enjoys a free-flowing design which highlights 4 bedrooms all with built in robes (ensuite to master), kitchen with ample bench & cupboard space overlooking an adjoining meals area continuing seamlessly through to an extended oversized family area.
Adding to the properties appeal is a wonderfully large backyard perfect for entertaining, double car garage with drive-thru access, heating, roomy laundry, central bathroom & so much more!
Situated to please, close to parkland, schools, shops & public transport. If family space, comfort & location are high on your agenda, then this home is a must inspect!

Description:
Effortlessly Setting The Scene For Relaxed Family Living
With schools, the station, freeway to the Ring Road and the shopping complexes leaving you spoilt for choice with an abundance of shopping, dining, and entertaining options all within a few minutes, growing families will appreciate the variety of lifestyle advantages this single level home on a generous 644m2 allotment (approx.) has to offer!
Cleverly arranged, generously proportioned interior spaces include four bedrooms, two bathrooms, a formal living space finished with engineered timber flooring, family meals stretching out from a kitchen offering stainless steel appliances and a servery window to the alfresco, and a versatile enclosed veranda. Set for year-round use, its the perfect space for a kids retreat/playroom and is large enough to swallow up a billiard table or table tennis table.
Complementing the internal living and entertaining options is a vast undercover alfresco space. Ready for large scale entertaining, it will work just as well as somewhere for the kids to ride their bikes and scooters when the weather turns.
Complete with new carpet, double garage fitted with rear roller door and built in storage, two powered sheds, alarm/security system and the year-round comfort of heating and cooling you can treat your family to the lifestyle they deserve!
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Exclusive Luxury & City Views
Opulently designed to leave a lasting impression, exhilarating proportions and a spectacular panorama extending from the Dandenong Ranges and farmland, to the city skyline define this sumptuous residence.
An exceptional design across all levels, enjoy the thrill of entertaining in the massive open-plan living dining and gourmet kitchen boasting a range of quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, long granite benches, and a glass splashback.
Your guests will marvel at the beauty of the ever-changing vista as you slide open the expansive doors, creating a seamless transition between the interior and the large balconies/outdoor entertaining areas.
The entire family will have endless fun in the separate theatre room, and enormous downstairs living area fitted with a bar, and doors out to the 4-car auto garage that can also be used as a workshop.
Appreciate the flexibility of 5 bedrooms including two master bedrooms with ensuites, 3 bathrooms, 4 toilets, 3 living areas, and a study that has potential to be used as a 6th bedroom across two levels including a ground floor with an exquisite covered balcony to enjoy the views, the master bedrooms features walk-in robes and a cutting-edge ensuite with vanity.
Soaring ceilings, polished timber floors, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar electric panels, roller shutters, ducted vacuum, security cameras, video intercom doorbell with 3 separate video monitors, laundry and landscaped garden, all add to the perfection of this home.
This timeless blend of luxury living has room to build a swimming pool or design your own fantastic backyard, this house is perfect for the growing family or for the business.
This magnificent gem is located in the most prestigious sort out location which is minutes away from Craigieburn and Highlands Shopping Centres, bus, train, freeway access and schools; Hume Anglican Grammar, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary and Mount Ridley College.
SEALED BID DATE: SATURDAY 9TH NOVEMBER 2019 AT 6PM

Comprising of three large bedrooms, master featuring walk in robe and en-suite and remaining bedrooms with BIR serviced by a central bathroom.

Other features include:
Ducted heating, split system cooling, water tank, double garage with drive through access to the back, ducted vacuum, Solar panels on PFIT 60c/kWh buy back rate and much, much more.
If you are looking for an easy lifestyle with a great location, then this is the one.

Description:
Indoor/Outdoor Excellence for Perfect Family Living!
In a delightful tree-lined streetscape, this remarkable residence occupies one of Mt Ridley's larger allotments (approx 785m2) delivering a brilliant family lifestyle with its expansive single-level floorplan, quality features & terrific living/entertaining spaces both inside & out.
High ceilings throughout, the impeccable interior provides premium family accommodation
comprising 4 large bedrooms (extra-large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), study/home office, stylish main bathroom & separate WC.
Impressively versatile, the home's multiple living zones include an elegant formal lounge & dining with gas-log fireplace, vast open-plan family/meals area & dedicated theatre room
complete with tiered flooring. Add to this a quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space, ducted heating & evaporative cooling for all-seasons comfort, along with a large laundry & excellent storage options throughout.
Step outside to discover a fabulous undercover entertaining area & expansive backyard
garden including a gazebo with outdoor spa, decking with integrated lighting, fish pond, large watertank, sprinkler system, plus a wonderfully deep remote-control double garage complete with its own reverse-cycle split-system air-conditioner.
Walking distance to parks & playgrounds, Grand Boulevard buses, local shops, childcare
centre & popular primary schools, it also offers easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping
centres & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
MORE LIKE A HOUSE THAN TOWNHOUSE! NO OWNERS CORPORATION AND LARGE BACKYARD,
Situated in a convenient location, on a 336m2 block of land, this immaculately presented modern town home is the perfect starter or investment property. Positioned on a corner allotment to enjoy loads of natural sunlight, the home features a sizeable backyard not often seen in townhouse living. The functional floorplan enjoys sun drenched kitchen living space, separate retreat/ study, powder room and ensuite. Also features rear accessed double garage with auto door, decked BBQ / entertaining area, evaporative cooling, ducted heating and much more.
Nearby schools include Aitken Creek Primary School, Oscar Romero Catholic School, and Newbury Primary. Also walking distance to Hume Tennis & Community Centre, Watermill reserve and Grand Blvd shops.

Description:
Location Location Location
Situated in arguably one of Craigieburn's best locations, adjacent to Craigieburn Central & all amenities including public transport, schools & parkland, this fantastic low maintenance property is a must for all to view. Featuring modern functional kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, open plan meals/family area which flows out to the balcony, generous bedrooms and bathrooms along with the single garage. Whether you're looking for a first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio this home offers a blend of low maintenance living while retaining both space and comfort. This one won't hang around for long, call now for an inspection.

Description:
Quality & Style in a Convenient Location
This modern home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation & long list of added features. Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers & investors alike!
From its attractive facade this home comprises 3 bedrooms (master with ensuite), designated study, fully equipped gourmet kitchen including 900mm gas cooktop & Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, adjoining meals area, spacious family room & separate lounge, central bathroom, full-sized laundry plus a garage with internal access.
Further features include; square set cornicing throughout, LED lighting, refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, landscaped gardens & so much more!
Perfectly located close to a range of lifestyle attractions including public transport, Malcolm Creek trails, Craigieburn Primary School, State Swim Centre, Pelican Childcare Centre & easy access to the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Warm and Inviting!!
Here is your chance to secure a spacious family home in a highly sought after location. From the moment you step inside you will feel like home, from space, character, class and warm and inviting feeling this home brings.
Comprising of 3 excellent size bedrooms plus open study, master with full ensuite. Offering a spacious open floor plan, good size kitchen that includes stainless steel appliances with ample cupboard space and bench space.
Extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, fire place all set on a spectacular size block of land measuring 707m2 approx.
Location speaks for itself close to Mother Teresa Catholic Crimary School, Highgate recreation reserve, Mount Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Hume HWY plus walk ways and parks.
Call today to inspect.

Description:
Uncompromised Space & Versatility on Approx 571sqm!
Absolute family perfection, this amazing 4 bedroom home is set on a huge block of land delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its flexible floorplan, premium inclusions & immaculate garden surrounds.
Designed & built for ultimate family enjoyment, the home's impressive interior comprises a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), main central bathroom & separate WC.
Spacious & versatile, the home's three distinct living zones include expansive open-plan family/dining area, light-filled rumpus/theatre room & a conveniently placed kids retreat, plus the added appeal of a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances & excellent storage.
Other stand-out features include high ceilings, high doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling family laundry & linen storeroom, 1.5KW solar system, Class A recycle water, plus 2 large outdoor decked entertaining areas (1 undercover), wonderfully wide backyard garden, sideway storage shed & internally-accessed double garage (remote-control)
Easy access to the very best of Craigieburn including popular schools, kinder/childcare services, public transport, aquatic centre & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & much more.
Insights: 33 Wattletree Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
